p: We investigated the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic in the United Arab Emirates (UAE) as an example of a highly populated, globally interconnected country with an equatorial hot climate and excellent control of the COVID-19 outbreak. In this work, we present the level of public health responses and control of SARS-CoV-2 in the UAE, and underline that publications about COVID-19 in the UAE are very rare. Figure 8a shows the confirmed cases and Figure 8b the fatalities in the UAE.
